name: 14.10-Fastx tool kit: FASTX statistics
description: Output quality statistics from FASTQ file in tab delimited text

parameters.name: Input
parameters.description: FASTA/Q input file. default is STDIN. If FASTA file is given, only nucleotides distribution is calculated (there's no quality info)

parameters.name: Output
parameters.description: TEXT output file. default is STDOUT
